website_summaries.verdict: A classic throwback to the original Power Rangers line that can stand alone as a collector piece, yet is sturdy enough to join a kid’s toy collection.
pros: Combines with any other Zord in the new Builder line of toys
Smooth and steady articulation of arms and legs, and the toy is well-balanced
cons: Very heavy due to its die-cast construction
Some parts seem a little loose, particularly around the torso

customer_reviews.title: We Need Dragonzord Power Now!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Dragonzord feels like it just came out of the show. A must have for Power Rangers fans.
customer_reviews.author: MrMcQuackX23

customer_reviews.title: GO GO Power Rangers
customer_reviews.text: Growing up with these as a kid I wanted to get the Legacy Dragonzord as I still have my original 1993 Dragonzord. This one is a lot more sturdy. More metal pieces that plastic. Must have for any collector.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ryan Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great Figure, Some Flaws
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the shipping box, the packaging had a gigantic gash in it, luckily the figure was not damaged and the damage on the box is on the back. Probably caused by the shipping company. The figure itself is an amazing recreation of the Dragonzord. The figure improves upon the original in every way, and is not that expensive. The problems I have with the figure though are more for its combined modes. When you fold the feet up to combine him with the megazord, the feet will want to fall due to them being diecast. Also the figure being so heavy causes the megazord to lean. Other than that this is a must have for any collector.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Fant

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy but that's cool. Make it more realistic
customer_reviews.text: Finally... I own a Dragonzord. Always wanted it since I was a kid. Very heavy but that's cool. Make it more realistic. The only complaint I have is his tail not being totally flexible so I need some space to place it do to the extension of it's tail. But over all I still give it 5 stars. Still hoping to find the Megazord one for a better price because over hundred bucks is way too much...
customer_reviews.author: Dijean Oreggio

customer_reviews.title: Def displays great. Seems a little shakier than the 93 toy ...
customer_reviews.text: Def displays great. Seems a little shakier than the 93 toy version tho. No other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Branham

customer_reviews.title: Cool!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon for making my Grandson's Christmas dreams come true with his Dragonzord.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Crick

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: If you have the legacy line then this is a must have to complete it, the dragonzord itself is good but lack of articulation is what makes me give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Arvin Rao

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and heavy! Legit
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product and actually pretty heavy! It's legit! My 4 yo loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great detail and a great price goes well with the rest of my green ranger memorabilia

customer_reviews.title: CHILDHOOD THROWBACK
customer_reviews.text: BAD A $$. Nice throwback!. No complaints. There where no stickers to add on after opening.Just connect the big tail and drill and presto.Amazing detail metallic paint is nice.the tail is awsome. I bought the legacy megazord, and I have to say the dragonzord seems to be heavier! Great craftsmanship with this legacy model bandai.! A MUST HAVE FOR ANY POWER RANGERS COLLECTOR. !

customer_reviews.title: Dragonzord
customer_reviews.text: Never got a chance to get one of these during the original run. Glad to see the reissue... Just as awesome as I remember it being!.. excellent build and combines perfectly with the megazord.

customer_reviews.title: Green Power rangers Dragon Zord
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Dragon zord very detailed and die cast metal and feels very heavy duty last very long time and make another great display peace along with the other Zord's i have very well made definitely would recommend it to power rangers fans.And the Dragon Dagger.

customer_reviews.title: Reliving my childhood
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted this, well the OG Dragon Zord, when i was a kid however this is still AWESOME! Thank you very much also sorry took so long for the review, The package came, everything intact, and it is AWESOME again thank you

customer_reviews.title: making this version physically superior than the 90's version
customer_reviews.text: The details are show accurate, making this version physically superior than the 90's version, although sadly this version doesnt have electronics like the 90's version The only drawback to this version is that it is a little flimsy when combined with Megazord. Not to mention the effort you have to go through in order to fit the Dragonzord onto the Megazord's shoulders

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!

Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because my box came with a penny sized hole in the back which isn't too much of a hassle for me but still that sucks to see after you shelled out $115 for it. I highly recommend it for any collector or anyone who loves the original green ranger.

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable curved/faulty detail.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this late last year for a significant other and finally got around to leaving a review. Seller should NOT be completely trusted. The Dragonzord's top head fin was noticeably bent/lopsided/curved. This detail was not included or mentioned anywhere on the page. ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS AND SHAMEFUL FOR THE PRICE. But to be fair the rest of the Dragonzord was fine. Just bothered by the surprise. I would not have bought it in the first place if I had known ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Aparicio

customer_reviews.title: Go go power rangers
customer_reviews.text: Loved this toy when I was little and now to have one of my own is awesome

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the original 1993 toy in every way. Looks just like the real thing! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Don't let this slip away!!
customer_reviews.text: Item is better than I remember it from the `90s. The die-cast parts add a certain flare that the original lacked. Also no decals makes a HUGE difference! If you were on the fence about this product please fear not, as it is an amazing addition to any Power Rangers collection.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Quaregna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I waited years for a screen accurate version of the Dragonzord, and it's finally here!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought it and it exceeds expectations of what he was expecting!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Get this while you can.
customer_reviews.text: This dragonzord is everything I could have hoped for as a kid. It's screen accurate, paint job looks amazing and they have gone above and beyond what power rangers fans could have expected. Every segment of the tail is also articulated. It is comparable with bandai's zordon builder system, so you can combine it with any of their sleds that have been released over the last 4 years or so. The only problem might be the weight of the item. It is partially diecast so any combination with previous odds might make it top heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sun

customer_reviews.title: Go Go Dragonzord!
customer_reviews.text: What it lacks in articulation is makes up for in nostalgic cool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kyzer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The MMPR Green and White Rangers were always my ultimate favorite from the series and I am happy to be a proud owner of this Legacy Dragonzord. The Legacy Dragonzord can be combined with both the 2010 original re-release of the Megazord as well as the 2013 Legacy Megazord. I am actually excited that I don't have to go out and buy the Legacy Megazord and can be content with the Megazord I already have. Thank you Bandia for this awesome Dragonzord!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Flores

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with Power Rangers but could not afford most toys as a kid. I am glad I finally got the chance to own a Dragonzord. This one is fantastic and more show accurate. The figure comes in a small box and you cannot see the figure without opening the box. There is NO display window. Mine came shipped by Amazon in a box that just fit the Dragonzord and came in near mint condition. I love it. Go Go Power Rangers!
customer_reviews.author: D.D

customer_reviews.title: He loved it - Brownie points for MIL
customer_reviews.text: Gift for son-in-law - an avid collector. He loved it - Brownie points for MIL! win-win :) fast shipping and great service!

customer_reviews.title: the results were better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Incredible detail, brings back the childhood. Couldn't wait to combine it with my legacy megazord, the results were better than expected. A must buy for any collector/fan.

customer_reviews.title: I was happy that I got the Legacy Megazord before I got ...
customer_reviews.text: When I was grew up during the 90s, my biggest regret was not getting the first MMPR megazords. But when I heard that the Legacy Dragonzord was coming out for the 20th anniversary of Power Rangers, I know that I have to get it! I saved up all of my money for this. I was happy that I got the Legacy Megazord before I got the Dragonzord first. Now my childhood is complete!

product_meta.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers Legacy Green Dragonzord, Green
product_meta.description: Return to the excitement of the original Mighty Morphin Power Rangers series with the Green Ranger's Legacy Dragonzord! First released in 1993 as a part of the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers toy line, this new version of Tommy's Dragonzord retains all of the details of the original and improves it by including diecast metal pieces. True to the original series, you can even combine the Dragonzord with the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers Legacy Dino Megazord to create a show-accurate combination! The Legacy Dragonzord is a must have for collectors of all ages!
feature_bullets: Legacy Dragonzord Die-Cast Metal Action Figure
Stands 11-inches tall and features tons of detail

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars232 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
